'''''Minecraft: Tetris (Original Soundtrack)''''' is an {{w|Extended play|extended play}} released for ''[[Minecraft]]'' featuring compositions by Charles Taylor, known professionally as "driftingaway", which consists of the songs that were released as part of the ''{{w|Tetris}}'' DLC. It was released on July 30, 2024, the same day that the DLC was released on the Marketplace.
